rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a foyer and a Vastu-aligned front door, ensuring positive energy flow.
An open-plan living room with minimalist design elements, ample natural light, and a central focus area for joint family gatherings.
A minimalistic dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring an extendable table and modern fixtures aligned with Vastu principles.
The kitchen is designed in a minimalist style with energy-efficient appliances and optimized workflow following Vastu guidelines.
Compact quarters for domestic help, ensuring privacy and functionality while adhering to local building norms.
A modern bathroom designed with water-saving fixtures and a minimalist aesthetic.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to the east to invite positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Large windows for ample natural light and ventilation, placed in alignment with south-eastern direction to optimize energy flow.
Balcony door connecting the dining area to an outdoor terrace, promoting a seamless indoor-outdoor experience.

swimming_pool.description: A minimalist swimming pool designed with clean lines and energy-efficient water management systems, complementing the bungalow's aesthetic while providing recreational space for joint families.

vastu_considerations.room_placement: Living and dining areas centrally located to balance family dynamics.
vastu_considerations.water_feature: Pool positioned away from the main entrance to maintain privacy and proper Vastu flow.
